text:
Здравейте,

 

По анекс 2А METBG_Tibiel_EFET_Annex2_Q1_25_3 от 25/11/2024 -300.000 MWh*45.64 €, като депозит е преведена сума от 123 228 Евро.

 

МЕТ Енерджи имат възражения, че в Анекса е записана сумата за депозита в размер на 125,000.00 €.

 

Моля за съдействие по довнасяне на депозита.

 

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД

Sent: Monday, December 2, 2024 2:14 PM

Cc: METBG_GASTRADING <metbg_gastrading@met.com>; METBG_GASOPS <metbg_gasops@met.com>
Subject: RE: METBG_TIBIEL 300 MWh/d - Q1, 25

 

Здравейте,

 

По анекс 2А METBG_Tibiel_EFET_Annex2_Q1_25_3 от 25/11/2024 -300.000 MWh*45.64 €, изчисляваме, че 10% от стойността на сделката, който трябва да се преведе като депозит отново е 123 228 Евро, колкото сме платили.

 

Моля, за конкретика относно възражението ви, на каква база е изчислена сумата от 125,000.00 €.

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Cc: METBG_GASTRADING <metbg_gastrading@met.com <mailto:metbg_gastrading@met.com> >; METBG_GASOPS <metbg_gasops@met.com <mailto:metbg_gasops@met.com> >; Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >
Subject: METBG_TIBIEL 300 MWh/d - Q1, 25

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

Please confirm the below deal that we agreed on today:

 

SELLER

TIBIEL EOOD

BUYER

MET Energy Trading Bulgaria EAD

DELIVERY POINT

Virtual Trading Point of the Bulgarian National Gas Transmission Network (EIC: 58Z--VTPN-NAT--1)

DELIVERY  PERIOD

From 07:00 am on 01.01.2025 to 07:00 am on 01.04.2025

TOTAL CONTRACTED QUANTITY (TCQ)

27 000 MWh

Take-or-Pay

In case for the Delivery period the Buyer has accepted quantity of natural gas which is less than the TCQ, the Buyer shall pay to the Seller a compensation calculated as the Price of Natural Gas multiplied by the difference between TCQ and accepted quantity.

[ТCQ minus Accepted Quantity during the Delivery Period] * The Delivery Price

MONTHLY CONTRACTED QUANTITY (MCQ)

The sum of the DCQ multiplied by the number of the calendar days of each delivery month

DAILY CONTRACT QUANTITY

300 MWh/d

TIME UNIT

Gas day

CONTRACT PRICE

45.64 EUR/MWh

PAYMENT

1.       Payment for the Monthly Contracted Quantity:  

-          50% of the MCQ multiplied by the Contract Price. Payment deadline: 20th calendar day of the delivery month;

-        50% of the MCQ multiplied by the Contract Price relevant. Payment deadline: 5th calendar day after the delivery month.

CREDIT SUPPORT

 

No later than 27.11.2024, the Seller shall provide to the Buyer Bank deposit in the amount of 125 000 (One hundred twenty-five thousand) Euro, securing the delivery of natural gas in the Period of Delivery. The Buyer shall return the above-mentioned Bank deposit to the Seller, when the last invoice for the Period of Delivery is issued.

OTHER CONDITIONS

According to the EFET agreement dated 08/07/2020

 

Please find attached draft of EFET Annex 2A for your review and signature.

 

Thank you.

Regards,

Dessy

 



 

Desislava Ivanova

Natural Gas Logistic and Operational Analyst

 

MET Energy Trading Bulgaria EAD

2, Pozitano str. Perform Business Center,

Floor 9, Sofia 1000

Mobile:  + 359 884 85 52 52

Office:   +359 2 8 50 40 39

Fax:       +359 2 8 50 40 39

E-mail: desislava.ivanova@met.com <mailto:desislava.ivanova@met.com>

- 40 000 (Forty thousand) EUR on 5th of March 2025
- 45 000 (Forty-five thousand) EUR on 5th of April 2025
